```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import

```{r}
raw <- read_csv("data-out/hot100_current.csv")

raw %>%  glimpse()
```

## Check most recent chart

```{r check}
counts <- raw %>% 
  group_by(chart_week) %>% 
  summarise(cnt = n()) %>% 
  arrange(chart_week %>% desc())

counts %>% head()
```

Looking for short counts

```{r short-counts}
counts %>% 
  filter(cnt != 100)
```
